title: BioShock Remastered – v1.0.122872
body:
BioShock Remastered – v1.0.122872


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, 3D
Companies: 2K Boston, 2K Australia, Blind Squirrel, 2K
Languages: ENG/MULTI6
Original Size: 17.2 GB
Repack Size: from 4.7 GB [Selective Download]

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / LATER KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only] MULTi6
  • FreeTorrents ENG Only
  • Tapochek.net [magnet] ENG Only
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2] MULTi6
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, partially compatible with other mirrors) MULTi6
  • Filehoster: MegaUp (Uploaded by Sylvano, partially compatible with other mirrors) MULTi6

There is a minor bug in created desktop icon. It leads to non-existant Bioshock.exe, while should lead to BioshockHD.exe. To fix it, open icon properties and change the path, so it would point to BioshockHD.exe.

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on BioShock.Remastered-CODEX ISO release: codex-bioshock.remastered.iso (16,824,565,760 bytes)
  • The following updates were installed one after another: BioShock.Remastered.Update.v20161007-CODEX (559 MB), BioShock.Remastered.Update.v20161220-CODEX (584 MB) and BioShock.Remastered.Update.v20171205-CODEX (396 MB)
  • Game version: v1.0.122872
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selected download feature: you can skip downloading and installing components you don’t need: language files, credits videos, attract video, developers comments videos & unused videos
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 17.2 to 4.7~9.2 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 5-20 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 21 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game’s “Build\Final” folder to change the game language
  • Repack uses ZTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

You can skip downloading of unnecessary languages and videos. Here is the list of such files:

At least one of the language files must be downloaded

fg-selective-english.bin
fg-selective-french.bin
fg-selective-german.bin
fg-selective-italian.bin
fg-selective-japanese.bin
fg-selective-spanish.bin

fg-optional-documentary.bin (Director’s Commentary: Imagining BioShock, featuring Ken Levine and Shawn Robertson)
fg-optional-attract.bin (demo trailer)
fg-optional-credits.bin (credits videos)
fg-optional-unused.bin (leftovers from console versions of the game, not used on PC)

In example, if you want play the game with Spanish UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers and to unlock Director’s Commentary – skip all selective/optional files, but download fg-selective-spanish.bin, fg-optional-documentary.bin & all main files (01-04).

Game Description

BioShock is a shooter unlike any you’ve ever played, loaded with weapons and tactics never seen. You’ll have a complete arsenal at your disposal from simple revolvers to grenade launchers and chemical throwers, but you’ll also be forced to genetically modify your DNA to create an even more deadly weapon: you.

Game Features

  • Museum of Orphaned Concepts
  • Challenge Rooms
  • Director’s Commentary: Imagining BioShock, featuring Ken Levine and Shawn Robertson
  • Achievements
  • Full Controller Support
  • High Resolution Textures, Models and Interface
  • 4K Resolution Support

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my initial BR repack.
